tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE research_grants (
 grant_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
 grant_title VARCHAR(255),
 grant_description TEXT,
 grant_amount NUMERIC,
 start_date DATE,
 end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE research_grants (
    grant_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    grant_title VARCHAR(255),
    grant_amount DECIMAL,
    grant_status VARCHAR(50),
    grant_deadline DATE
);

CREATE TABLE funding_information (
    funding_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    grant_id UUID REFERENCES research_grants(grant_id),
    funding_source VARCHAR(100),
    funding_amount DECIMAL,
    funding_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE research_grants (
  grant_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  grant_title VARCHAR(255),
  researcher_name VARCHAR(100),
  funding_amount DECIMAL(10,2),
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE funding_sources (
  source_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  source_name VARCHAR(100),
  contact_person VARCHAR(100),
  email_address VARCHAR(255),
  phone_number VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE grants (
 grant_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
 grant_title TEXT NOT NULL,
 grant_description TEXT,
 grant_amount DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE researchers (
 researcher_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
 researcher_name TEXT NOT NULL,
 researcher_email TEXT UNIQUE,
 researcher_department TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE funding_sources (
 funding_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
 funding_name TEXT NOT NULL,
 funding_type TEXT,
 funding_amount DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE grant_researcher_mapping (
 grant_id INT REFERENCES grants(grant_id),
 researcher_id INT REFERENCES researchers(researcher_id),
 PRIMARY KEY (grant_id, researcher_id)
)

CREATE TABLE research_projects (
    project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_title VARCHAR(100),
    project_description TEXT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE project_funding (
    project_id INT,
    source_id INT,
    amount_received DECIMAL(15, 2),
    PRIMARY KEY(project_id, source_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES research_projects(project_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (source_id) REFERENCES funding_sources(source_id)
);
